One of the issues that precipitated this change[ of the CEO] was what happened in China. But China is not the cause-it's symptomatic of the broader disconnect between the way that Eric Schmidt wanted to run Google and the way the founders wanted to run the company, says David Wolf , chief executive of David Wolf Group Asia, a Beijing-based Mark Zuckerbergeting-strategy firm.
